citeinfo.title: Endangered animals: a reference guide to conflicting issues

descript.abstract: This paper describes the continually arising conflicts of people and brown bear populations. Brown bears are coming into areas in which they had never been seen before to search for food and end up in areas that conflict with human safety. The scientist also looks at natural history and future prognosis.
